name: Pure Rock Crawling 4x4
description:
Pure Rock Crawling 4x4 is a game based on the concept of creating a better tire and better simulation of the suspension. The main goal is to create a slow, exciting journey through rocky paths, forest hills and flat deserts. Such a trip is the best way to admire the beauty of rock climbing.


Pure Rock Crawling 4x4 - Flexible tires, realistic suspension and more! The game is built around the idea of ​​creating an ideal suspension and pick up the right tires for it. The main goal is to design a car that will easily pass through the rocky mountains, forests and deserts. But most interesting, of course, to overcome steep cliffs.

Test - Simple and straightforward.
The main test is as follows: on the way you are waiting for control points, where you must drive. Be careful and try to drive as far as possible.
